item.title: Learning Rust: My Journey
item.description:
I have recently started learning Rust, and it’s been an exciting journey.

Why Rust?

  • Memory safety without a garbage collector
  • High performance
  • Great for system programming and web assembly

I will be sharing tutorials, projects, and challenges I encounter while learning Rust. ðŸš€
